Reviews.Title: “Superb location!”
Reviews.Author: YvesStGullbekk
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel july 2011 situated 35 mins walk st marks square difficulty finding hotel maybe arrived venice noon time square swarmed people insane hotel average location breakfast continental plain fancy wireless internet free plus definitely recommendable

Reviews.Title: “Quaint, Convenient and Quiet”
Reviews.Author: Allyouneed
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights midoctober perfect location heart venice thank trip advisor reviewers able hotel staff warm welcoming hey venice price included breakfast reasonably priced compared venice hotels american hotel expect comforts home typical european clean updated clean maintained downside bed hard rock found italian hotels staff delightful helpful welcoming location beat location absolutely beat

Reviews.Title: “Never again. Great location doesn't account for poor quality or service”
Reviews.Author: TaJye
Reviews.Content: planned week vacation rome florence venice 31st birthday read reviews expected didnt expect bugs poor customer service checked maps bothered explain map offer assistance map confusion color coded legend needless lost alot 9 floors 2 top floor meant elevator carry bags narrow circular staircase forced carry luggage evidently porter feels okay entered bathroom ants weird bugs centipede look coming sink told front desk basically told lying guest complained lived street issue bugs im trying figure living street hotel bugs digress proceeded directions market buy bug spray course minutes cursing look couldnt reservations left returned looked didnt surprise shower sprays sort debris water dirt hair etc taking shower question wasnt bad tried covers found hairs sheets yuck stay location price nice worth sleepless nights

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Lousy Bed”
Reviews.Author: omegaman1
Reviews.Content: comfort diana welllocated enjoyed close piazza san marco staff wonderful clean bathroom newly renovated bed terrible fairly thin mattress wire frame suffered backache 3 days checking price accomodations suspect location major factor

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: thediver1964
Reviews.Content: stayed diana nights june 2010 location superb 50 walk san marco square benefits tucked described alley hotel staff friendly facilities spotlessly clean budget hotel expect pay larger hotel moans size bad planning guest hotel noticed breakfast continental offering started assume gripe pays minimum buts expects feast venice food hotel recommend hopefully soon

Reviews.Content: train pass vaporeto st marks walk square block youve arrived clean nice hotel price easy walk day special vaporetto directly cruise terminal avoiding bridges buses trams walking

Reviews.Content: ok name hotel huge amount favours centre venice feel safer paying hotel nestled stones throw form st marks square excellent value venetian friendly location superb price comes continental skip morning stay recommend
